ygData.subject: HAAA are you stil here ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ho guys are you stil alive? :) Two months ago it was 2 digest per day and now heu ONE message per day :) Everyone is on hollyday or everyone now play another
ygData.messageBody:
Ho guys are you stil alive? :)
Two months ago it was 2 digest per day and now heu ONE message per day :)
Everyone is on hollyday or everyone now play another race/classes ? (there
are less wizzard right now :( )

WAKE UP ALL WE ARE STILL ALIVE !:) heu i hope so :)


yakos
level 27 wizzard
dabou
level 20 shaman
